alert.note: Alert for Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 3:27PM EDT until September 08 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN ESSEX COUNTY... At 327 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Derry to near Newbury to near Ipswich, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Haverhill, Methuen, Gloucester, North Andover, Newburyport, Amesbury, Ipswich, Salisbury, Georgetown, Boxford, Hamilton, Newbury, Groveland, Merrimac, Topsfield, Rowley, West Newbury, and Essex. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
